# Docs for the Azure Web Apps Deploy action: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134798
# More GitHub Actions for Azure: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2135048

name: Deployment of ocean integration app to develop branch

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - develop

env:
  AZURE_FUNCTIONAPP_PACKAGE_PATH: '.' # set this to the path to your web app project, defaults to the repository root
  NODE_VERSION: '16.x' # set this to the node version to use (supports 8.x, 10.x, 12.x)

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, npd, Linux]

    steps:
    # checkout the repo
    - name: 'Checkout Github Action'
      uses: actions/checkout@v3


    - name: Set up Node.js version
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: ${{ env.NODE_VERSION }}

    - name: npm install, build, and test
      run: |
        npm install
        npm run build --if-present
        npm run test --if-present

    - name: 'Run Azure Functions Action and deploy'
      uses: Azure/functions-action@v1
      with:
        app-name: baydig-dev-rpm-oceanintegrationfa
        slot-name: Production
        publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZUREAPPSERVICE_PUBLISHPROFILE_34AF38A65E744E7F82E4A978AC744ACF }}
        package: ${{ env.AZURE_FUNCTIONAPP_PACKAGE_PATH }}
